pages.text:
Every time Amahle wants
to help, all she hears is  NO .

Mama picks up Amahle’s toothbrush.
 Mama, can I squeeze the toothpaste? 

But Mama says...
No, Amahle, you are too young.

Baba is looking for his keys.
 Baba, can I drive your bakkie? 

But Baba says...
No, Amahle, you are too young.

Mkhulu’s chickens are clucking outside.
 Mkhulu, can I feed the chickens? 

But Mkhulu says...
No, Amahle, you are too young.

Amahle sees Mama in the kitchen.
 Mama, can I boil water for tea? 

But Mama says...
No, Amahle, you are too young.

Amahle runs over to
Gogo’s vegetable garden.
 Gogo, can I water the plants? 

But Gogo Says...
No, Amahle, you are too young.

Amahle grabs a book from the table.
 Mama, can I read to Teddy? 

And Mama says...
